item.title: Tracing Water's Global Journey: How Temperature Has Always Driven Earth's Water Cycle
item.description:
Water is life. It’s also one of the most complex and important systems on our planet. So when we ask what happens to water availability as global temperatures continue to rise, we’re really asking one of the most critical questions of our timeâ€”one with multi-billion dollar implications for societies around the world.

To find answers about the future, my colleagues and I did what paleoclimatologists do best: we looked to the past.
